  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(java.lang.String ip, int port, UI userInterface)
      Initialize the client
      Parameters:
      ip - the ip of the server in which the client has to connect
      port - the port of the server in which the client has to connect
      userInterface - the selected user interface

      Parameters:

    • asyncReadFromSocket

      public java.lang.Thread asyncReadFromSocket()
      Read asynchronously messages from the socket while the client is active.
      Returns:
      reading thread
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the message format is unexpected
      java.lang.Exception - if a generic exception happens shut down the server

    • run

      public void run() throws java.io.IOException
      Thread-like run function which tries to connect to the server, setting up the input and output streams and keeps listening while the server is active
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.util.NoSuchElementException
